articles.description: All the latest reaction from the Premier League as Liverpool win at Leicester to close in on the title while Leicester are relegated back to the Championship.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Liverpool close in on title as Leicester relegated

articles.description: Monday's four scheduled matches in the top flight of Italian football are postponed following the death of Pope Francis.
articles.title: Pope Francis: Italian Serie A matches postponed after pontiff's death

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains why the race for a top-five finish in the Premier League will go to the wire.
articles.title: Alan Shearer: 'An incredible battle' - why Premier League top-five race is 'impossible to call'

articles.description: Mel Reid's appointment as vice-captain for the third time is a reminder that despite England's contribution to Solheim Cup, the country has never hosted the match.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2030: England has never hosted - is it time?

articles.description: Can Trent Alexander-Arnold's magic moment and will celebrations yet keep at Liverpool, asks BBC Sport Chief Football Writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Leicester 0-1 Liverpool: Trent Alexander-Arnold's enjoys iconic moment in special Reds career

articles.description: The curious case of dominant head-to-head records, while Holger Rune wins in Barcelona - your weekly tennis round-up.
articles.title: Second Serve: Iga Swiatek's unwanted head-to-head record against Jelena Ostapenko continues

articles.description: Max Verstappen would not discuss the penalty he was given in Saudi Arabia for fear of getting into trouble, writes Andrew Benson.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian Grand Prix: Max Verstappen won't discuss penalty because 'people can't handle the full truth'

articles.description: Stephen Curry scores a game-high 31 points as the Golden State Warriors begin their play-off campaign with a win at the Houston Rockets.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Stephen Curry leads Golden State Warriors to win at Houston Rockets

articles.description: Zhao Xintong completes a 10-4 first-round win over Jak Jones to knock the 2024 runner-up out of the World Snooker Championship.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Zhao Xintong beats Jak Jones

articles.description: Manchester United's worst ever Premier League season hits another low as they fail to score in defeat by Wolves at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Man Utd 0-1 Wolves: 'If we don't score, nothing matters' - Ruben Amorim concern
